#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <unistd.h>
#include <iostream>
#define BS 64*1024
 
char ibuffer[BS];
int ibuffer_offset=0;
int ibuffer_size=0;
 
static unsigned long inline fastread() {
unsigned long r=0, s=1;
while(1) {
if(ibuffer_offset >= ibuffer_size) {
ibuffer_size = read(0, ibuffer, BS);
ibuffer_offset = 0;
}
if(ibuffer[ibuffer_offset] < 48) {
if(s) ibuffer_offset++;
else return r;
}
else {
s = 0;
r = r * 10 + ibuffer[ibuffer_offset++]-48;
}
}
}

main()
{
 int t,n,i,j,num,hn,hc,count;
 t=fastread();
 while(t--)
 {
  
  n=fastread();
  int a[100];
  i=0;count=0;hn=0;hc=0;
   while(i<n)
   {
     num=fastread();
     a[i++]=num;
   }
  
  for(i=1;i<=10000;i++)
   {
    count=0;
    for(j=0;j<n;j++)
     { 
       if(a[j]==i)
          count++;
     }
    if(count>hc)
      {
        hc=count;
        hn=i;
        
      }
   }
 printf("%d %d\n",hn,hc);
 }
}
